title: A Tale of mail
creator_credit: Donald Stearn, William Canning and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated film made in co-operation with the Canadian Post Office in which the artist has free rein to show how he thinks letters travelled from one place to another in the early days of transportation. A lively presentation of historical facts.
creator_credit_for_label: Donald Stearn, William Canning and National Film Board of Canada
